Basketball: Curry out for three months after surgery on hand, say Warriors

02 Nov 2019, 06:52

SAN FRANCISCO: Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry will be out of action for at least three months after undergoing surgery to repair his fractured left hand, the struggling NBA giants said on Friday (Nov 1).
A team statement said Curry underwent successful surgery at Cedars-Sinai Kerlan-Jobe Institute in Los Angeles on Friday to fix the second metacarpal bone following the Warriors loss to Phoenix on Wednesday.

"Curry is expected to make a full recovery and an update on his status will be provided in three months," the team said.
Curry suffered the injury after falling heavily following a foul by Phoenix center Aron Baynes during the Warriors' 121-110 loss to the Suns on Wednesday.
The injury means that the six-time All Star and two-time NBA MVP will not return until February at the earliest.
News of Curry's long injury layoff was a further hammer blow to the Warriors, who were already facing a period of transition following the departure of Kevin Durant and the long-term absence of Klay Thompson, who is expected to miss the entire season as he recovers from a knee injury.
The Warriors, who reached five NBA finals in a row between 2015 and 2019, have suffered a series of catastrophic defeats in early season play, with heavy losses to the Oklahoma City Thunder and the Los Angeles Clippers as well as the Suns.
Source: AFP/ec

SESS warns of wind gusts, in particular in the Kyiv region

02 Nov 2019, 06:35

On Saturday on the Right Bank and in the Kyiv region significant wind gusts are expected.
Source: SES website
Literally: "According to the UkrHydrometer, on November 2 in the afternoon on the Right Bank, in Kiev and Kiev region wind gusts of 15-20 m / s."
Details: At the same time, according to the Hydrometeorological Center, rain is expected in the western part of Ukraine on Saturday afternoon, and in the rest of the territory it will be partly cloudy.
In most areas the temperature is 6-8 degrees Celsius in the afternoon. In the East in the afternoon 3-5 heat. In the south of Ukraine in the afternoon up to 11 degrees Celsius.



In Kiev, the weather is expected on Saturday with no precipitations, only in the night of November 3 in places will be a slight rain. South wind, 7-12 m / s, daytime gusts 15-20 m / s.



Saturday afternoon 6-8 ° C. On Sunday, November 3, the air temperature will start to rise, at night we expect 3-5 ° warm, in the day 10-12 °.
